comment:
This is designed to be a no sparge, single infusion, parti gayle recipe with the second runnings being a dunkelweizen.
The dunkle will have 1# each of vienna midnight wheat and 2# of wh wheat as well as 2 oz tettnang one each added at 60 and 15 minutes.
Boils on each of these is 90 minutes with the first hop additions after 30 minutes have elapsed.
